bibl.title: A Comparative Study on the Construction and the Use of the Domestic Bread Oven in Egypt during the Graeco-Roman and Late Antique / Early Byzantine Period. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Problems, method and restrictions of the study. - Typology. - Conclusions on the chronology and technological evolution of the different types. - Discussion on the functioning of the domestic bread oven. - A possible reconstruction of the baking process. - Abstract. - Appendix [ovens listed per site in chronological order, with bibliographical references].
bibl.seg: DEPRAETERE David D.E., A Comparative Study on the Construction and the Use of the Domestic Bread Oven in Egypt during the Graeco-Roman and Late Antique / Early Byzantine Period. Avec résumé en anglais.

Problems, method and restrictions of the study. - Typology. - Conclusions on the chronology and technological evolution of the different types. - Discussion on the functioning of the domestic bread oven. - A possible reconstruction of the baking process. - Abstract. - Appendix [ovens listed per site in chronological order, with bibliographical references].
